QuestData.Title: The Wounded King
QuestData.Description:
I have things under control here... for now, at any rate.
If we want to salvage this situation, Rastakhan must survive. Habutu is gone, but his other guardian, Zolani, has sent word.
She is protecting the King at a small fishing village called Zeb'ahari. Find Zolani and do what you can to ensure Rastakhan lives.
Be careful, $n.
